name: io.github.alex-feel/mcp-context-server
description: An MCP server that provides persistent multimodal context storage for LLM agents.

environmentVariables.description: Log level
environmentVariables.name: LOG_LEVEL

environmentVariables.description: Storage backend type: sqlite (default) or postgresql
environmentVariables.name: STORAGE_BACKEND

environmentVariables.description: Maximum individual image size in megabytes
environmentVariables.name: MAX_IMAGE_SIZE_MB

environmentVariables.description: Maximum total request size in megabytes
environmentVariables.name: MAX_TOTAL_SIZE_MB

environmentVariables.description: Custom database file location path
environmentVariables.name: DB_PATH

environmentVariables.description: Maximum number of concurrent read connections in the pool
environmentVariables.name: POOL_MAX_READERS

environmentVariables.description: Maximum number of concurrent write connections in the pool
environmentVariables.name: POOL_MAX_WRITERS

environmentVariables.description: Connection timeout in seconds
environmentVariables.name: POOL_CONNECTION_TIMEOUT_S

environmentVariables.description: Idle connection timeout in seconds
environmentVariables.name: POOL_IDLE_TIMEOUT_S

environmentVariables.description: Connection health check interval in seconds
environmentVariables.name: POOL_HEALTH_CHECK_INTERVAL_S

environmentVariables.description: Maximum number of retry attempts for failed operations
environmentVariables.name: RETRY_MAX_RETRIES

environmentVariables.description: Base delay in seconds between retry attempts
environmentVariables.name: RETRY_BASE_DELAY_S

environmentVariables.description: Maximum delay in seconds between retry attempts
environmentVariables.name: RETRY_MAX_DELAY_S

environmentVariables.description: Enable random jitter in retry delays
environmentVariables.name: RETRY_JITTER

environmentVariables.description: Exponential backoff multiplication factor for retries
environmentVariables.name: RETRY_BACKOFF_FACTOR

environmentVariables.description: Enable SQLite foreign key constraints
environmentVariables.name: SQLITE_FOREIGN_KEYS

environmentVariables.description: SQLite journal mode (e.g., WAL, DELETE)
environmentVariables.name: SQLITE_JOURNAL_MODE

environmentVariables.description: SQLite synchronous mode (e.g., NORMAL, FULL, OFF)
environmentVariables.name: SQLITE_SYNCHRONOUS

environmentVariables.description: SQLite temporary storage location (e.g., MEMORY, FILE)
environmentVariables.name: SQLITE_TEMP_STORE

environmentVariables.description: SQLite memory-mapped I/O size in bytes
environmentVariables.name: SQLITE_MMAP_SIZE

environmentVariables.description: SQLite cache size (negative value for KB, positive for pages)
environmentVariables.name: SQLITE_CACHE_SIZE

environmentVariables.description: SQLite page size in bytes
environmentVariables.name: SQLITE_PAGE_SIZE

environmentVariables.description: SQLite WAL autocheckpoint threshold in pages
environmentVariables.name: SQLITE_WAL_AUTOCHECKPOINT

environmentVariables.description: SQLite busy timeout in milliseconds
environmentVariables.name: SQLITE_BUSY_TIMEOUT_MS

environmentVariables.description: SQLite WAL checkpoint mode (e.g., PASSIVE, FULL, RESTART)
environmentVariables.name: SQLITE_WAL_CHECKPOINT

environmentVariables.description: Server shutdown timeout in seconds
environmentVariables.name: SHUTDOWN_TIMEOUT_S

environmentVariables.description: Test mode shutdown timeout in seconds
environmentVariables.name: SHUTDOWN_TIMEOUT_TEST_S

environmentVariables.description: Queue operation timeout in seconds
environmentVariables.name: QUEUE_TIMEOUT_S

environmentVariables.description: Test mode queue timeout in seconds
environmentVariables.name: QUEUE_TIMEOUT_TEST_S

environmentVariables.description: Circuit breaker failure threshold before opening
environmentVariables.name: CIRCUIT_BREAKER_FAILURE_THRESHOLD

environmentVariables.description: Circuit breaker recovery timeout in seconds
environmentVariables.name: CIRCUIT_BREAKER_RECOVERY_TIMEOUT_S

environmentVariables.description: Maximum calls allowed in circuit breaker half-open state
environmentVariables.name: CIRCUIT_BREAKER_HALF_OPEN_MAX_CALLS

environmentVariables.description: Complete PostgreSQL connection string (overrides individual settings if provided)
environmentVariables.name: POSTGRESQL_CONNECTION_STRING

environmentVariables.description: PostgreSQL server host address
environmentVariables.name: POSTGRESQL_HOST

environmentVariables.description: PostgreSQL server port number
environmentVariables.name: POSTGRESQL_PORT

environmentVariables.description: PostgreSQL database username
environmentVariables.name: POSTGRESQL_USER

environmentVariables.description: PostgreSQL database password
environmentVariables.name: POSTGRESQL_PASSWORD

environmentVariables.description: PostgreSQL database name
environmentVariables.name: POSTGRESQL_DATABASE

environmentVariables.description: PostgreSQL connection pool minimum size
environmentVariables.name: POSTGRESQL_POOL_MIN

environmentVariables.description: PostgreSQL connection pool maximum size
environmentVariables.name: POSTGRESQL_POOL_MAX

environmentVariables.description: PostgreSQL connection pool timeout in seconds
environmentVariables.name: POSTGRESQL_POOL_TIMEOUT_S

environmentVariables.description: PostgreSQL command execution timeout in seconds
environmentVariables.name: POSTGRESQL_COMMAND_TIMEOUT_S

environmentVariables.description: Close idle PostgreSQL connections after this many seconds (0 to disable, default: 300)
environmentVariables.name: POSTGRESQL_MAX_INACTIVE_LIFETIME_S

environmentVariables.description: Recycle PostgreSQL connections after this many queries (0 to disable, default: 10000)
environmentVariables.name: POSTGRESQL_MAX_QUERIES

environmentVariables.description: asyncpg prepared statement cache size. Set to 0 for external pooler compatibility (PgBouncer transaction mode, Pgpool-II, etc.). Default: 100
environmentVariables.name: POSTGRESQL_STATEMENT_CACHE_SIZE

environmentVariables.description: Maximum lifetime of cached prepared statements in seconds (default: 300). Has no effect when statement_cache_size=0
environmentVariables.name: POSTGRESQL_MAX_CACHED_STATEMENT_LIFETIME_S

environmentVariables.description: Maximum size of statement to cache in bytes (default: 15360). Has no effect when statement_cache_size=0
environmentVariables.name: POSTGRESQL_MAX_CACHEABLE_STATEMENT_SIZE

environmentVariables.description: PostgreSQL SSL mode (disable, allow, prefer, require, verify-ca, verify-full)
environmentVariables.name: POSTGRESQL_SSL_MODE

environmentVariables.description: PostgreSQL schema name for table and index operations (default: public)
environmentVariables.name: POSTGRESQL_SCHEMA

environmentVariables.description: Enable semantic search functionality
environmentVariables.name: ENABLE_SEMANTIC_SEARCH

environmentVariables.description: Enable embedding generation for stored context. Default true - server fails if dependencies not met. Set false to disable embeddings.
environmentVariables.name: ENABLE_EMBEDDING_GENERATION

environmentVariables.description: Ollama API host URL for embedding generation
environmentVariables.name: OLLAMA_HOST

environmentVariables.description: Ollama truncation mode: false (default) returns error when context exceeded, true enables silent truncation
environmentVariables.name: OLLAMA_TRUNCATE

environmentVariables.description: Ollama context window size in tokens (default: 4096, range: 512-131072)
environmentVariables.name: OLLAMA_NUM_CTX

environmentVariables.description: Embedding model name for semantic search
environmentVariables.name: EMBEDDING_MODEL

environmentVariables.description: Embedding vector dimensions
environmentVariables.name: EMBEDDING_DIM

environmentVariables.description: Timeout in seconds for embedding generation API calls
environmentVariables.name: EMBEDDING_TIMEOUT_S

environmentVariables.description: Maximum number of retry attempts for embedding generation
environmentVariables.name: EMBEDDING_RETRY_MAX_ATTEMPTS

environmentVariables.description: Base delay in seconds between retry attempts (with exponential backoff)
environmentVariables.name: EMBEDDING_RETRY_BASE_DELAY_S

environmentVariables.description: Enable full-text search functionality
environmentVariables.name: ENABLE_FTS

environmentVariables.description: Language for FTS stemming (e.g., english, german, french)
environmentVariables.name: FTS_LANGUAGE

environmentVariables.description: Characters of context around each FTS match for reranking passage extraction (default: 750)
environmentVariables.name: FTS_RERANK_WINDOW_SIZE

environmentVariables.description: Merge FTS match regions within this character distance (default: 100)
environmentVariables.name: FTS_RERANK_GAP_MERGE

environmentVariables.description: Enable hybrid search combining FTS and semantic search with RRF fusion
environmentVariables.name: ENABLE_HYBRID_SEARCH

environmentVariables.description: RRF smoothing constant for hybrid search (default 60)
environmentVariables.name: HYBRID_RRF_K

environmentVariables.description: Multiplier for over-fetching results before RRF fusion (default: 2)
environmentVariables.name: HYBRID_RRF_OVERFETCH

environmentVariables.description: Default sort order for search results: relevance (only 'relevance' supported in current version)
environmentVariables.name: SEARCH_DEFAULT_SORT_BY

environmentVariables.description: Enable text chunking for embedding generation (default: true)
environmentVariables.name: ENABLE_CHUNKING

environmentVariables.description: Target chunk size in characters (default: 1000)
environmentVariables.name: CHUNK_SIZE

environmentVariables.description: Overlap between chunks in characters (default: 100)
environmentVariables.name: CHUNK_OVERLAP

environmentVariables.description: Chunk score aggregation method: max (only 'max' supported in current version)
environmentVariables.name: CHUNK_AGGREGATION

environmentVariables.description: Multiplier for over-fetching chunks before deduplication (default: 5)
environmentVariables.name: CHUNK_DEDUP_OVERFETCH

environmentVariables.description: Enable cross-encoder reranking of search results (default: true)
environmentVariables.name: ENABLE_RERANKING

environmentVariables.description: Reranking provider (default: flashrank)
environmentVariables.name: RERANKING_PROVIDER

environmentVariables.description: Reranking model name (default: ms-marco-MiniLM-L-12-v2)
environmentVariables.name: RERANKING_MODEL

environmentVariables.description: Maximum input length for reranking in tokens (default: 512)
environmentVariables.name: RERANKING_MAX_LENGTH

environmentVariables.description: Multiplier for over-fetching results before reranking (default: 4)
environmentVariables.name: RERANKING_OVERFETCH

environmentVariables.description: Directory for caching reranking models
environmentVariables.name: RERANKING_CACHE_DIR

environmentVariables.description: Estimated characters per token for passage size validation (default: 4.0, range: 2.0-8.0)
environmentVariables.name: RERANKING_CHARS_PER_TOKEN

environmentVariables.description: Embedding provider: ollama (default), openai, azure, huggingface, or voyage
environmentVariables.name: EMBEDDING_PROVIDER

environmentVariables.description: OpenAI API key for OpenAI embedding provider
environmentVariables.name: OPENAI_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: Custom base URL for OpenAI-compatible APIs
environmentVariables.name: OPENAI_API_BASE

environmentVariables.description: OpenAI organization ID
environmentVariables.name: OPENAI_ORGANIZATION

environmentVariables.description: Azure OpenAI API key
environmentVariables.name: AZURE_OPENAI_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: Azure OpenAI endpoint URL
environmentVariables.name: AZURE_OPENAI_ENDPOINT

environmentVariables.description: Azure OpenAI embedding deployment name
environmentVariables.name: AZURE_OPENAI_EMBEDDING_DEPLOYMENT_NAME

environmentVariables.description: Azure OpenAI API version (default: 2024-02-01)
environmentVariables.name: AZURE_OPENAI_API_VERSION

environmentVariables.description: HuggingFace Hub API token for HuggingFace embedding provider
environmentVariables.name: HUGGINGFACEHUB_API_TOKEN

environmentVariables.description: Voyage AI API key for Voyage embedding provider
environmentVariables.name: VOYAGE_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: Voyage AI truncation mode: false (default) returns error when context exceeded, true enables silent truncation
environmentVariables.name: VOYAGE_TRUNCATION

environmentVariables.description: Voyage AI batch size for embedding requests
environmentVariables.name: VOYAGE_BATCH_SIZE

environmentVariables.description: Enable LangSmith tracing
environmentVariables.name: LANGSMITH_TRACING

environmentVariables.description: LangSmith API key
environmentVariables.name: LANGSMITH_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: LangSmith project name
environmentVariables.name: LANGSMITH_PROJECT

environmentVariables.description: LangSmith API endpoint URL
environmentVariables.name: LANGSMITH_ENDPOINT

environmentVariables.description: Comma-separated list of metadata fields to index (field:type format)
environmentVariables.name: METADATA_INDEXED_FIELDS

environmentVariables.description: Index sync mode: strict (fail), auto (sync), warn (log), additive (default, add missing only)
environmentVariables.name: METADATA_INDEX_SYNC_MODE

environmentVariables.description: Transport mode: stdio for local, http for Docker/remote
environmentVariables.name: MCP_TRANSPORT

environmentVariables.description: HTTP bind address (use 0.0.0.0 for Docker)
environmentVariables.name: FASTMCP_HOST

environmentVariables.description: HTTP port number
environmentVariables.name: FASTMCP_PORT

environmentVariables.description: Comma-separated list of tools to disable (e.g., delete_context,update_context)
environmentVariables.name: DISABLED_TOOLS

environmentVariables.description: Bearer token for HTTP authentication (required when using SimpleTokenVerifier)
environmentVariables.name: MCP_AUTH_TOKEN

environmentVariables.description: Client ID to assign to authenticated requests
environmentVariables.name: MCP_AUTH_CLIENT_ID

environmentVariables.description: Authentication provider class path (e.g., app.auth.simple_token.SimpleTokenVerifier)
environmentVariables.name: FASTMCP_SERVER_AUTH

environmentVariables.description: Google OAuth Client ID (required when using GoogleProvider)
environmentVariables.name: FASTMCP_SERVER_AUTH_GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID

environmentVariables.description: Google OAuth Client Secret (required when using GoogleProvider)
environmentVariables.name: FASTMCP_SERVER_AUTH_GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET

environmentVariables.description: Server base URL for OAuth callbacks (required when using GoogleProvider)
environmentVariables.name: FASTMCP_SERVER_AUTH_GOOGLE_BASE_URL

environmentVariables.description: Required OAuth scopes (comma-separated, e.g., openid,email)
environmentVariables.name: FASTMCP_SERVER_AUTH_GOOGLE_REQUIRED_SCOPES

environmentVariables.description: Azure OAuth Client ID (required when using AzureProvider)
environmentVariables.name: FASTMCP_SERVER_AUTH_AZURE_CLIENT_ID

environmentVariables.description: Azure OAuth Client Secret (required when using AzureProvider)
environmentVariables.name: FASTMCP_SERVER_AUTH_AZURE_CLIENT_SECRET

environmentVariables.description: Azure Tenant ID - use specific GUID for org-only access, 'organizations' for multi-tenant, or 'consumers' for personal accounts
environmentVariables.name: FASTMCP_SERVER_AUTH_AZURE_TENANT_ID

environmentVariables.description: Server base URL for OAuth callbacks (required when using AzureProvider)
environmentVariables.name: FASTMCP_SERVER_AUTH_AZURE_BASE_URL

environmentVariables.description: Required OAuth scopes for Azure (comma-separated, e.g., read,write)
environmentVariables.name: FASTMCP_SERVER_AUTH_AZURE_REQUIRED_SCOPES
